data.message: Hey, I don't really like the new trending news setup, for what it's worth.

replies.message: Thanks for the feedback, Jack. We listen to all the feedback we get from the Facebook community. If you have any suggestions, we'd love to hear from you: on.fb.me/1N2bhYs. -Monica
I'd like it to remain how it was; not all change is good.
Ya its like click bate to figure out what the story is about you have to click it. I don't like it at all

I'd love to know who at FB thought it was a worthwhile idea to show us how many people are talking about any given topic. It's a meaningless data point for the average user (and probably for most users). Just show me the news blurb, I'll hover to see a little more info, and click if it interests me. 17k people talking about it means little to me.
They got rid of the people that made those headlines. Its all just computer algorithms now. I used it a lot, now I don't even try.
the new trending set up is horrible. i am not going to click on every one to see what the topic is so i do not read any of them now.
